Shivah::

Shivah meditate a while Killfest answer"Well " said the male "What do 
you think a bout this solution: We can leave them in that cointainer, 
if they have the virus then we kill them there, if they don't have 
the virus we leave them there until we think that is necesary kill 
them... Altough I think that one or the three must die"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest considers something for a moment, then replies. "It has 
risks, obviously. Those bots could be carrying the virus themselves. 
However, on the plus side, Maximals usually give in after seeing one 
or two of their friends killed before their eyes."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Shivah::
> > 
> > "Are you sure that will be a good idea, Commander Killfest?"said 
> > shiva with a gesture that Darkfate used to do.
